name: Topological Lifetime Correlation
description: Analyze the correlation between knot topological indices and particle lifetime (stability).

hypothesis.H0: Topological indices (Crossing, Det, Sig) have no statistically significant correlation with particle lifetime.
hypothesis.H1: ln(tau) correlates with knot topological indices with R2 > 0.60 and p < 0.01666 (Bonferroni corrected).

data_requirements.description: Particle lifetime data and KnotInfo topological indices.

test_method: Multivariate regression analysis and Monte Carlo permutation test for FPR evaluation.
